## ValueOf type

Get values of T.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export type ValueOf<T> = T[Keys<T>]
```
<b>References:</b> [Keys](./types-kit.keys.md)

## Example


```ts
 interface Props {
   a?: number
   b: string
   c: boolean
 }

 // Expect: number | string | boolean | undefined
 type PropValues = ValueOf<Props>
```
